article: Once there was an old man in a town . He always forgot a lot of things . So his wife always had to say to him , ' Don ' ' t forget this ! ' One day he went on a long trip alone . Before he left home , his wife said , ' Now you have all these things . They are what you need for your trip . Take care of your things during the trip . ' He went to the station , bought a ticket and got on the train with it . About half an hour later , the conductor began to see the tickets . He came to the old man and said , ' Will you please show me your ticket ? ' The old man looked for his ticket in all his pockets , but he could not find it . He was very worried . ' I ca n ' t find my ticket . I really bought a ticket before I got on the train . ' said the old man . ' I believe you bought a ticket . All right , you don ' ' t have to buy another one , ' said the conductor kindly . ' But how can I know where I ' m going ? I ca n ' t remember my station ! ' the old man said sadly .

model: the old man could not remember where it was .
the old man forgot where it was .
the old man did n ' t buy it at all .
the old man could n ' t find it .
human: The old man forgot go buy it .

The old man ' s wife took the ticket away .
